xxl.core.indexStructures
Class MultiDiskBTree.Node

java.lang.Object

              xxl.core.indexStructures.MultiDiskBTree.Node
Enclosing class:
MultiDiskBTree
public class MultiDiskBTree.Node
extends BTree.Node

Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of MultiDiskBTree. Nodes are stored in containers.

See Also:
Tree.Node, ORTree.Node, MultiDiskBTree.Node

Constructor Detail

MultiDiskBTree.Node

public MultiDiskBTree.Node()
Method Detail

split

protected Tree.Node.SplitInfo split(Stack path)
Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
Splits the current node. A new node is created, but no handle is reserved for this node in its container (i.e. container.insert() or container.reserve() are not called at this stage). This means that no index entry for this node is passed to its parent-node.

Overrides:
split in class BTree.Node
Parameters:
path - the nodes already visited during this insert
Returns:
a SplitInfo containig all information needed about the split
